price: "E deixais vossas mulheres, que vosso Senhor criou para vós? Mas, sois um povo agressor".
arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمۡ رَبُّكُم مِّنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِكُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٌ عَادُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: watadharūna mā khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwājikum bal antum qawmun ʿādūna
